profile.title: Prúfil ning Gumagamit
profile.mustLogin: Kailangan mung mag-login para akit me ing settings.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Ipakitang pareho ing orihinal at isinalin a mensahi
profile.filterExplicit: Salain la reng masyadong lantad a laman
profile.saveError: Malyari yang error: e me-salba ing settings
profile.avatarError: Malyari yang error keng pag-upload ning avatar
profile.noPrivateKey: Ala yang private key keng device a ini para i-export.
profile.setBackupPassword: Maglagay password para i-encrypt ing backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ilagay ing password para keng backup a iti:
profile.importSuccess: Me-import neng masalese ing private key keng device a ini.
profile.importFailed: Me-fail ing pag-import ning key (malyaring password o corrupt file).
profile.keysRotated: Me-generate neng bayo a key pair at me-upload neng public key.
profile.rotateFailed: Me-fail ing rotation da reng key.
profile.keyDisclaimer: E lalabas keng device a ini ing private key mu. I-export me ing password-protected copy para i-restore keng aliwang device.
profile.callTextForwardingSection: Pamag-forward da reng tawag at text
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: I-forward la reng papasok a tawag at text king verified mung teleponu o email. Ing lulual a tawag/text makapakitang Chatforia number mu.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: I-forward la reng text king teleponu
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: I-forward la reng text king email

chat.selectPrompt: Pili kang mensahi o chat room para umpisan ing pamag-chat
